feed.title: Clipious Releases
feed.subtitle: Self-hosted software releases generated by selfh.st

entry.title: New release for Clipious: 1.22.0
entry.content:
What's Changed

  • Translations update from Hosted Weblate by @weblate in https://github.com/lamarios/clipious/pull/601
  • add sleep timer for videos by @lamarios in https://github.com/lamarios/clipious/pull/606
  • add sliders to adjust device brightness and volume when the video is â€¦ by @lamarios in https://github.com/lamarios/clipious/pull/607
  • Fix issue preventing new users to set up servers and throwing them at a non loading video list

Full Changelog: https://github.com/lamarios/clipious/compare/1.21.3...1.22.0

Screencast from 2024-09-28 13-12-46.webm Screencast from 2024-09-28 17-52-02.webm

entry.title: New release for Clipious: 1.22.2
entry.content:
What's Changed

  • Translations update from Hosted Weblate by @weblate in https://github.com/lamarios/clipious/pull/609
  • make screen brightness and volume as a setting by @lamarios in https://github.com/lamarios/clipious/pull/612
  • Handles upcoming videos by @lamarios in https://github.com/lamarios/clipious/pull/613
  • remove audio switch for live videos by @lamarios in https://github.com/lamarios/clipious/pull/614

Full Changelog: https://github.com/lamarios/clipious/compare/1.22.1...1.22.2

entry.title: New release for Clipious: 1.22.4
